trustfund:
TF027980-SWISS CONSULTANT TRUST FUND FOR
            EASTERN EUROPE AND THE CIS,TF023330-SIDA CTF FOR EASTERN EUROPE,TF037647-ROMANIA - POLLUTION ABATEMENT,TF035160-ROMANIA - CAPITAL MARKETS PRIVATIZATION,TF031510-ROMANIA - INDUSTRIAL DEVELOPMENT,TF022596-PHRD-INDUSTRIAL DEVELOPMENT
            PROJECT II,TF023063-PHRD-INDUSTRIAL RESTRUCTURING

abstracts.cdata!:
The Industrial Development Project will
            finance: (a) investment of private enterprises to improve
            international competitiveness and/or expand exports; (b)
            exports by providing partial to full coverage of
            exporters' pre-shipment finance needs for imported
            inputs; and (c) technical assistance to help in designing
            and implementing policies and strategies for privatization
            and restructuring, and for strengthening institutional
            capacity of the individual participating financial institution.
